entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as getting up, dressed and going for a last look at his Firebolt. He is also mentioned to be wondering where he'd have lunch.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is mentioned as an object that Harry looks at before leaving.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking incredibly freckly and waving frantically at Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being very brown and waving frantically at Harry.

entities.name: florean fortescue's ice cream parlor
entities.description: Florean Fortescue's Ice Cream Parlor is mentioned as a location where Ron and Hermione are sitting.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: The Leaky Cauldron is mentioned as a location that Ron and Hermione visited to look for Harry.

entities.name: flourish and blotts
entities.description: Flourish and Blotts is mentioned as a location that Ron and Hermione visited to look for Harry.

entities.name: madam malkin's
entities.description: Madam Malkin's is mentioned as a location that Ron and Hermione visited to look for Harry.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as Mr. Weasley's workplace.

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is mentioned in the context of what happened to her.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as working at the Ministry of Magic and knowing about Aunt Marge's situation.

relationships.description: Harry owns or has possession of the Firebolt.
Ron visited the Leaky Cauldron with Hermione to look for Harry.
Hermione visited the Leaky Cauldron with Ron to look for Harry.
Harry left the Leaky Cauldron before Ron and Hermione arrived.
Ron is with Hermione at Florean Fortescue's Ice Cream Parlor.
Harry stayed at the Leaky Cauldron.
Mr. Weasley works at the Ministry of Magic.
Mr. Weasley knows about Aunt Marge's situation.
